attributes.action: Plant REAL Poppies at the Tower f London
attributes.additional_details: There is loads of talk about keeping the Poppies at the Tower of London, however seeing as all have been sold it isn't fair on those how have paid, expecting a lasting reminder or for the Charities that would of benefitted. I suggest in place of the onimental poppies REAL poppy seeds are planted so we get to see the sea of red every year.
